feed.title: Terra Antiqua Documentation
feed.subtitle: This is the web version of the manual and the documentation for Terra Antiqua (v1.0) - a QGIS plugin for paleogeographic reconstructions.

author.name: Diego Ruiz, Jovid Aminov, Guillaume Dupont-Nivet

entry.title: New web version of the manual

link.title: New web version of the manual

entry.content:
Today we present the web version of the manual. So far only the pdf version was available, which was hosted on Google Drive. Now we have a real documentation website on GitHub. We hope you will find it helpful and you will find easily what you are looking for. Feel free to comment on anything and to give us feedback (on the manual or on the plugin) through this form .

The sample data bundle is also to be downloaded from this website. It is available here: Sample data bundle

This has been correctly updated in the welcome pop-up message of Terra Antiqua (v1.0.2).

The old pdf manual is still available here.

author.name: Diego Ruiz, Jovid Aminov, Guillaume Dupont-Nivet
